name: Hotdog Wars - Eating Contest
description:
Top 10 USA with TONS of downloads worldwide

According to legend, the first Hotdog Wars contest was held in July of 1916 between four people. The champion was declared to be the most patriotic. Now more than 90 years later, the tradition continues in the fun game Hotdog Wars!

Compete against 20 other hotdog lovers from different countries as one of the four heroes. Ride on the “bus of champions” and continue winning more hotdog eating contests. Battle in 20 levels and go after the coveted international "bejeweled" mustard-yellow belt. Rise to the top and be the next Hotdog Wars Champion!

Do you think you have the guts to be the next champion? Then what are you waiting for?! Start eating tons of hotdogs in Hotdog Wars!

HOTDOG WARS FEATURES:

ENTER A HOTDOG EATING CONTEST
- Eat tons of hotdogs using simple controls
- Just tap left-right-left and scarf down more hotdogs than your competition

CHALLENGE YOUR SKILLS
- Compete against 20 cartoon characters that will make LOL while eating hotdogs
- Test your eating skills in 20 fun levels, each better than the last
- Challenge your friends to hotdog eating competitions and see who can eat the most hotdogs!

COMPARE YOUR SCORES
- Compare your hotdog scores against friends and other hotdog eaters on the leaderboard
- Connect to Facebook and Twitter to see your friends’ scores

Compete in legendary hotdog eating contests and challenge yourself to eat more hotdogs than the rest of the competition. Eat the most hotdogs and win the title of Hotdog Wars Champion!

Download now to enter your first hotdog eating contest!

App Store Quotes:
"Omg this game is so awesome. It is so addicting I can’t put it down : )"

"I LOVE THIS GAME"
